name: ReFigma: Figma's UI kit (unofficial)
description:
ReFigma was my first experience with Figma when I decided to redesign the editor itself to learn how it was built from the inside. 


I tried a design system suitable for development (and even made some coding work). Every piece of this UI was built from scratch. I've used an awesome plugin Appearance for the dark theme, and it works like a charm.


The whole work took me about a month. It was challenging but very fun! Hope you'll love it ❤️


rakeda.com
